pull.title: [qt] Make network disabled icon 50% opaque
pull.body: The png was sampled too low, so displayed incorrectly on high res displays. Also, I modified the alpha channel a bit.

events.body:
utACK fa30b060eec1f51238292a63039dcc7943abf236

SVG's XML is interpreted and created differently. No need for bikeshedding there.

ACK fa30b06
Tested on Windows x64
![GUI Screenshot](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11365204/20247681/c74858ce-a9d2-11e6-9ffe-9dbcd8790c21.png)
Thanks to both Marco and Luke!

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,11 +5,11 @@
    xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
-   id="svg2"
-   viewBox="0 0 24 24"
-   height="24"
+   version="1.2"
    width="24"
-   version="1.2">
+   height="24"
comments.body: The size of the SVG isn't changed...

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,11 +5,11 @@
    xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
-   id="svg2"
-   viewBox="0 0 24 24"
-   height="24"
+   version="1.2"
    width="24"
-   version="1.2">
+   height="24"
comments.body:
This is not required. You can tell the program of your choice what dpi to sample at.

Nonetheless, I changed it to `92` for this svg, as well as for all `connect-$N.svg`
